Text: Xavier, you are absolutely THE MAN!  Thank you a thousand times for posting all the ECG stuff.  Are you also going to post the POV versions?  Particularly, Brittany, Erin, Angelina & Danica?  If so, great.  If not - oh, well - what you've done already is enough to earn  my eternal gratitude, so rock on!
Actually, all the pov ones are already available so its not hard to find them on torrent sites. The reg versions are tough to find which is why xavier rocks for posting them.
